description: Dynamic devcontainer configuration and automated container worker execution

1.name: Foundation
1.description: Independent foundational tasks with no dependencies

2.name: Core Generators
2.description: Build on foundation - dynamic generation and container launch

tasks.title: Update init.py to use ProjectStack for multi-language detection
tasks.description: Replace single-type detect_project_type() with ProjectStack from security_rules.py. Display all detected languages, frameworks, and databases in init output.

verification.command: cd /tmp && rm -rf test-dc && mkdir test-dc && cd test-dc && touch requirements.txt package.json go.mod && python -m mahabharatha.commands.init 2>&1 | grep -E 'python|javascript|go'

acceptance_criteria: detect_project_type() returns ProjectStack instead of str
init output shows all detected languages
Backwards compatible with existing config structure

tasks.title: Create devcontainer_features.py with feature mapping
tasks.description: Create new module with DEVCONTAINER_FEATURES dict mapping languages to ghcr.io feature URLs and CUSTOM_INSTALL_COMMANDS for unsupported languages.

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.devcontainer_features import DEVCONTAINER_FEATURES, CUSTOM_INSTALL_COMMANDS; print(len(DEVCONTAINER_FEATURES), len(CUSTOM_INSTALL_COMMANDS))"

acceptance_criteria: DEVCONTAINER_FEATURES maps 8+ languages to feature URLs
Includes version defaults for each feature

tasks.title: Implement ContainerLauncher base class in launcher.py
tasks.description: Add ContainerLauncher class inheriting from WorkerLauncher. Implement spawn(), monitor(), terminate(), get_output() methods with Docker CLI commands.

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.launcher import ContainerLauncher, LauncherType; print(ContainerLauncher.__bases__, LauncherType.CONTAINER.value)"

acceptance_criteria: Uses docker CLI for container operations
Proper error handling for missing Docker

tasks.title: Create DynamicDevcontainerGenerator using features
tasks.description: Add DynamicDevcontainerGenerator class that takes ProjectStack and generates devcontainer.json with appropriate features from DEVCONTAINER_FEATURES mapping.

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.devcontainer_features import DynamicDevcontainerGenerator; from mahabharatha.security_rules import ProjectStack; g = DynamicDevcontainerGenerator(ProjectStack(languages={'python','go'})); print(g.generate_config())"
verification.expected: Returns dict with features for python and go

acceptance_criteria: Generates features dict with correct URLs
Handles custom install commands via postCreateCommand
Uses base ubuntu image for multi-language

tasks.title: Add container spawn with claude execution
tasks.description: Extend ContainerLauncher spawn() to mount worktree, set env vars, and execute claude --dangerously-skip-permissions inside container. Create worker_entry.sh script.
acceptance_criteria: Script invokes claude with proper flags

tasks.title: Update create_devcontainer() to use dynamic generator
tasks.description: Modify create_devcontainer() in init.py to use DynamicDevcontainerGenerator with detected ProjectStack instead of static single-language config.

verification.command: cd /tmp && rm -rf test-dc2 && mkdir test-dc2 && cd test-dc2 && touch requirements.txt package.json && mahabharatha init --no-security-rules && cat .devcontainer/devcontainer.json | python -c "import sys,json; d=json.load(sys.stdin); print('python' in str(d.get('features',{})) and 'node' in str(d.get('features',{})))"

acceptance_criteria: postCreateCommand includes custom installs if needed

tasks.title: Update .mahabharatha/devcontainer.py for multi-language
tasks.description: Update DevcontainerGenerator in .mahabharatha/devcontainer.py to support multi-language via features parameter. Maintain backwards compatibility.

verification.command: python -c "from importlib.util import spec_from_file_location, module_from_spec; spec = spec_from_file_location('dc', '.mahabharatha/devcontainer.py'); m = module_from_spec(spec); spec.loader.exec_module(m); print(hasattr(m.DevcontainerGenerator, 'generate'))"

acceptance_criteria: Falls back to single-image for single-lang

tasks.title: Add auto-detect launcher mode in orchestrator
tasks.description: Update _create_launcher() in orchestrator.py to auto-detect: use ContainerLauncher if .devcontainer exists and image is built, otherwise SubprocessLauncher.

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.orchestrator import Orchestrator; from mahabharatha.config import MahabharathaConfig; c = MahabharathaConfig(); print(hasattr(Orchestrator, '_create_launcher'))"

acceptance_criteria: Checks if Docker image exists before using container mode
Config override takes precedence over auto-detect

tasks.title: Wire ContainerLauncher to orchestrator
tasks.description: Complete orchestrator integration: _spawn_worker uses ContainerLauncher when mode=container, _poll_workers monitors containers, _terminate_worker stops containers.

verification.command: python -c "from mahabharatha.orchestrator import Orchestrator; from mahabharatha.launcher import ContainerLauncher; print('ContainerLauncher' in str(Orchestrator._create_launcher.__code__.co_consts if hasattr(Orchestrator._create_launcher, '__code__') else 'ContainerLauncher'))"

acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator uses ContainerLauncher for container mode
Worker spawn creates containers with correct mounts

tasks.title: Add --mode flag to kurukshetra command
tasks.description: Add --mode subprocess|container|auto option to mahabharatha kurukshetra. Pass mode to orchestrator config. Default to 'auto'.

tasks.description: Update mahabharatha:init.md and mahabharatha:kurukshetra.md skill files to document multi-language detection and container mode options.
